events.message: I ordered a jacket last week but it doesn't fit, and I want to return it for a full refund as soon as possible.
The customer's request has been classified under the Refund cluster due to return and refund keywords in their message.
Case has been assigned to agent Emily for further communication and resolution regarding the refund request.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out about your jacket return. I'm here to help you process your refund quickly.
Could you please confirm the order number and let us know if the jacket has been worn or damaged in any way?
The order number is 789654123, and I have not worn or damaged the jacket at all. It’s still in the original condition.
Thank you for the details. You can send the jacket back using our prepaid return label, and once we receive it, we will issue a full refund within 5 business days.
Thanks for this! I appreciate the quick response and the return label. I will send the jacket back today.
We’ve received your returned jacket and processed the full refund. You should see the amount credited to your account shortly.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received the refund for your jacket return. Please let us know if everything is satisfactory.
Closing this case as the refund has been confirmed received and the customer did not report further issues.
